meaningMnemonic: To the <radical>servant</radical> you say: "<radical>gun</radical>, <radical>ground</radical>, <radical>plate</radical>." It is your job to <kanji>oversee</kanji> everything they do.
readingMnemonic: Why must you <kanji>oversee</kanji> everything? Because you are Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん), and Genghis Khan oversees everything.
